text:
*Is someone know how to trigger a print and a click ?*
Use case = I have a dynamic banner just for specific leads. I would like to trigger when this banner appear and when the user clicks !

I believe that Click can be triggered with Event but I donâ€™t know how to trigger SHOW ?

Thanks a lot !
Loic, when you say print, do you mean like a document printing prompt, or do you mean like displaying a message to the user?
a DIV element displaying to the user

Easiest way (I think, if I understand the situation correctly) would be to include it in the markup, but give it a CSS class that hides the element. Then on click, toggle that CSS class to show or hide. You can do with with jQuery or vanilla javascript.

See if this helps: <https://www.w3schools.com/howto/howto_js_toggle_class.asp>

Thanks I did bad explain
I want to gather DATA
I need to calculate ROI of my BANNER

Number of views (trigger with ?)
Number of clicks (trigger with EVENTS)

Sorry for my previous explainations
ahh, gotcha. For that, I would set up some custom Google Analytics events. Fire one on document load (view) then set up a click handler to fire that custom event. Something like this:
That would be a custom Google Analytics event for clicks of a certain element.
(sorry, didn't know I couldn't post snippets in threads)
